name: testkit styles :)
media:
<style>
            .resizable {
                overflow: auto;
                resize: both; /* Allow both horizontal and vertical resizing */
                box-sizing: border-box; /* Include padding and border in element's total width and height */
            }
            .draggable {
            padding: 2px;
            background-color: gold;
            line-height: normal;
            position: absolute;
            cursor: move;
            }
            .dragged_content {
            padding: 10px;
            background-color: silver;
            cursor: auto;
            user-select: text;
            }
            .fineprint {
                font-size: 13px;
                font-weight: 300;
                text-shadow: 0px 0px 2px SteelBlue;
                letter-spacing: -1px;
            }
        </style>
